item.title: Emera Q4 Earnings Release and Conference Call
item.description: [Business Wire] - Today Emera announced that its Q4 2016 earnings will be released after the market close on Friday, February 10, 2017. The company will be hosting a teleconference at 11:00am Atlantic time on Monday, February 13, 2017 to discuss the Q4 2016 financial results.

Emera Initiates Energy Solicitation for Atlantic Link Transmission Project
item.description: [Business Wire] - A solicitation process has been initiated for energy to be bundled with transmission capacity on Emera Inc.’s proposed Atlantic Link submarine electricity transmission project for the delivery of clean energy into the ISO-New England market.

item.title: Emera Announces Closing of $45 Million Over-Allotment Option
item.description: [Business Wire] - Emera Incorporated announces today that, in connection with its recently completed bought deal offering of 6,630,000 common shares at $45.25 per Common Share , the over-allotment option granted to the underwriters to purchase up to an additional 994,500 Common Shares at the Offering Price was exercised in full for additional aggregate gross proceeds to Emera of approximately $45 million.

item.title: Norway wealth fund excludes 15 coal related firms, more to follow
Norway wealth fund excludes 15 coal related firms, more to follow
Norway wealth fund excludes 15 coal related firms, more to follow
item.description: [Reuters] - Norway's central bank, which manages the country's $869 billion wealth fund, has excluded an additional 15 companies from its portfolio due to their use or production of coal, and plans further exclusions next year, it said on Wednesday. The world's largest sovereign wealth fund also placed 11 firms under observation for potential future exclusion. In total, Norges Bank has so far excluded 59 companies and placed 11 companies under observation under its so-called product-based coal criterion.
